botan.pubkey.algo.if_algo

IF Scheme

class IFSchemePublicKey: botan.pubkey.pk_keys.PublicKey;
This class represents public keys of integer factorization based (IF) public key schemes.

final const @property string algoName();
Used for object casting to the right type in the factory.

final const ref const(BigInt) getN();
Returns:
public modulus

final const ref const(BigInt) getE();
Returns:
public exponent

class IFSchemePrivateKey: botan.pubkey.algo.if_algo.IFSchemePublicKey, botan.pubkey.pk_keys.PrivateKey;
This class represents public keys of integer factorization based (IF) public key schemes.

const ref const(BigInt) getP();
Get the first prime p.

Returns:
prime p

const ref const(BigInt) getQ();
Get the second prime q.

Returns:
prime q

const ref const(BigInt) getD();
Get d with exp * d = 1 mod (p - 1, q - 1).

Returns:
d
